description: Score big with Verbatim's Store 'n' Go Sports Edition Mini USB drives! Simply transport and share files on this small-format USB drive, designed to give you basic storage in a sporty design. The included key ring lanyard easily attaches to your mobile phone or key ring, keeping your Mini USB conveniently connected and always within reach. This 8GB Mini USB Drive is perfect for anyone who wants a unique design of their favorite sport and needs reliable storage at his or her fingertips. Available in all of the most popular sports including Football, Baseball, Basketball, Golf, Tennis and Soccer! Backed by Verbatim's Lifetime limited warranty. USB 2.0 interface.
title: Verbatim 8GB Store 'n' Go Sports Edition Mini USB Drive, Basketball 98507
